title: Stag and Dagger Tip: Synth Eastwood
body:
![](http://www.capsule.org.uk/blog/wp-content/uploads/2010/03/syntheastwood2.jpg "SE")

Diesel, with the support of Dublin collective **Synth Eastwood** will be holding an exclusive party at the Art School, formed around the snaps they have taken of people during the day. **Synth Eastwood** will be roaming the streets and venues, taking photographs of gig goers whilst the festival is taking place, and then turning them into a large scale audio visual party. As well as this fantastic experience, the music is also top quality, brought to you by Dublin’s finest, and as if that wasn’t enough, tickets for **Stag and Dagger** are avaliable for half price from the official Diesel store in Glasgow.

[Buy Tickets For Stag And Dagger](http://www.staganddagger.com/)
